attributes.action: allow FREE retraining for all ages if made redundant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was made redundant in June 08, i was in the manufacturing industry, which as we all know is in dire straits. I would like to re-train in another trade like plumbing or electrician, but at the age of 36 can find no free training, i cant afford to pay for training so im forced to look for employment in manufacturing which is shedding jobs not creating them.Its a vicious circle.
Make re-training FREE for ALL those of ALL ages who have been made redundant and have not found suitable employment within 6 weeks.
